mean_veg_height.title: Mean Vegetation Height
mean_veg_height.description: Mean height above ground of points avove (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

mean_veg_height_first_return.title: Mean Vegetation Height (First Returns)
mean_veg_height_first_return.description: Mean height above ground of first return points above (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

median_veg_height.title: Median Vegetation Height
median_veg_height.description: Median height above ground of points above (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

max_veg_height.title: Maximum Vegetation Height
max_veg_height.description: Maximum height above ground of points above (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

q99_veg_height.title: 99th Percentile Vegetation Height
q99_veg_height.description: 99th percentile height above ground of points above (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

q95_veg_height.title: 95th Percentile Vegetation Height
q95_veg_height.description: 95th percentile height above ground of points above (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

q75_veg_height.title: 75th Percentile Vegetation Height
q75_veg_height.description: 75th percentile height above ground of points above (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

q50_veg_height.title: 50th Percentile Vegetation Height
q50_veg_height.description: 50th percentile (median) height above ground of points above (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

q25_veg_height.title: 25th Percentile Vegetation Height
q25_veg_height.description: 25th percentile height above ground of points above (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

q5_veg_height.title: 5th Percentile Vegetation Height
q5_veg_height.description: 5th percentile height above ground of points above (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

q1_veg_height.title: 1st Percentile Vegetation Height
q1_veg_height.description: 1st percentile height above ground of points above (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

min_veg_height.title: Minimum Vegetation Height
min_veg_height.description: Minimum height above ground of points above (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

prop_above_2m.title: Proportion of Points Above 2m
prop_above_2m.description: Proportion of all points with height above ground > 2m

prop_veg.title: Proportion of Vegetation Points
prop_veg.description: Proportion of all points with height above ground > veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

sd_veg_height.title: Standard Deviation of Vegetation Height
sd_veg_height.description: Standard deviation of height above ground for points above (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

cv_veg_height.title: Coefficient of Variation of Vegetation Height
cv_veg_height.description: Coefficient of variation (SD/mean) of height above ground for points above (>) veg cutoff (default 0.5 m)

gini_coeff_index_veg.title: Gini Coefficient of Vegetation Height
gini_coeff_index_veg.description: Gini coefficient index measuring inequality in vegetation height distribution

pulse_density.title: Pulse Density
pulse_density.description: Number of first returns divided by plot area

point_density.title: Point Density
point_density.description: Number of all returns divided by plot area

scan_angle_half_width.title: Scan Angle Half Width
scan_angle_half_width.description: Scan angle swath width. Calculated as max(abs(min_scan_angle), abs(max_scan_angle))

mean_canopy_height.title: Mean Canopy Height
mean_canopy_height.description: Mean value of canopy height pixels. Canopy height is the maximum vegetation point in 1 m grid.

deep_gap_fraction.title: Deep Gap Fraction
deep_gap_fraction.description: Fraction of pixels with canopy height below the vegetation cutoff (represented as 0).

top_rugosity.title: Top Rugosity
top_rugosity.description: Standard deviation of canopy height pixels. Canopy height is the maximum vegetation point in 1 m grid.

mean_sd_veg_height.title: Mean of SD of Veg Height
mean_sd_veg_height.description: Mean value of standard deviation of vegetation point height pixels (1m grid).

sd_sd_veg_height.title: SD of SD of Veg Height
sd_sd_veg_height.description: Standard deviation value of standard deviation of vegetation point height pixels (1m grid).

cv_sd_veg_height.title: CV of SD of Veg Height
cv_sd_veg_height.description: Coefficient of variation of standard deviation of vegetation point height pixels (1m grid).

sd_lai.title: Standard Deviation of eLAI
sd_lai.description: Standard deviation of effective Leaf Area Index

mean_mean_xy_lad.title: Mean of Mean LAD
mean_mean_xy_lad.description: Mean of the horizontal mean (x, y dimensions) of LAD. Mean of horizontal slices.

sd_mean_xy_lad.title: SD of Mean LAD
sd_mean_xy_lad.description: Standard deviation of the horizontal mean (x, y dimensions) of LAD. Mean of horizontal slices.

cv_mean_xy_lad.title: CV of Mean LAD
cv_mean_xy_lad.description: Coefficient of variation of the horizontal mean (x, y dimensions) of LAD. Mean of horizontal slices.

mean_cv_xy_lad.title: Mean CV of LAD
mean_cv_xy_lad.description: Mean of the coefficient of variation of LAD along a vertical column.

mean_mean_xy_plad.title: Mean of Mean PLAD
mean_mean_xy_plad.description: Mean of the horizontal mean (x, y dimensions) of LAD. Mean of horizontal slices.

sd_mean_xy_plad.title: SD of Mean PLAD
sd_mean_xy_plad.description: Standard deviation of the horizontal mean (x, y dimensions) of LAD. Mean of horizontal slices.

cv_mean_xy_plad.title: CV of Mean PLAD
cv_mean_xy_plad.description: Coefficient of variation of the horizontal mean (x, y dimensions) of LAD. Mean of horizontal slices.

mean_cv_xy_plad.title: Mean CV of PLAD
mean_cv_xy_plad.description: Mean of the coefficient of variation of LAD along a vertical column.

mean_mean_z_lad.title: Mean of mean LAD along a vertical column

sd_mean_z_lad.title: SD of Mean LAD (Vertical Profile)
sd_mean_z_lad.description: Standard deviation of mean LAD along a vertical column

cv_mean_z_lad.title: CV of Mean LAD (Vertical Profile)
cv_mean_z_lad.description: Coefficient of variation of mean LAD along a vertical column

mean_mean_z_plad.title: Mean of mean PLAD along a vertical column

sd_mean_z_plad.title: SD of Mean PLAD (Vertical Profile)
sd_mean_z_plad.description: Standard deviation of mean LAD along a vertical column

cv_mean_z_plad.title: CV of Mean PLAD (Vertical Profile)
cv_mean_z_plad.description: Coefficient of variation of mean LAD along a vertical column

mean_lad.title: Mean LAD
mean_lad.description: Mean Leaf Area Density across all voxels

sd_lad.title: Standard Deviation of LAD
sd_lad.description: Standard deviation of Leaf Area Density across all voxels

cv_lad.title: Coefficient of Variation of LAD
cv_lad.description: Coefficient of variation of Leaf Area Density across all voxels

shan_lad.title: Shannon Entropy of LAD
shan_lad.description: Shannon entropy index of LAD using 50 equal sized bins across LAD range.

shan_lad_set.title: Shannon Entropy of LAD
shan_lad_set.description: Shannon entropy index of LAD using 50 equal sized bins between 0 and 4.

mean_plad.title: Mean PLAD
mean_plad.description: Mean Leaf Area Density across all voxels

sd_plad.title: Standard Deviation of PLAD
sd_plad.description: Standard deviation of Leaf Area Density across all voxels

cv_plad.title: Coefficient of Variation of PLAD
cv_plad.description: Coefficient of variation of Leaf Area Density across all voxels

shan_plad.title: Shannon Entropy of PLAD
shan_plad.description: Shannon entropy index of PLAD using 50 equal sized bins across LAD range.

shan_plad_set.title: Shannon Entropy of PLAD
shan_plad_set.description: Shannon entropy index of PLAD using 50 equal sized bins between 0 and 1
